property.name: name
property.description: Name of the event. Examples: OrderPlaced, CreditCardAdded, etc.

property.name: entityID
property.description: Unique identifier of entity that the event is related to. Example: order code.

property.name: entityName
property.description: Name of the entity the event is about. Example: Order.

property.name: triggeredBy
property.description: Tells what triggered the current event. Possible values: Customer, CSA, Cron.

property.name: accountID
property.description: Identifier of current account when event was generated, i.e AmwayAccount.code. May be null if generated by a cron job.

property.name: countryCode
property.description: ISO code of the country where even was generated.

property.name: generationTime
property.description: Date and time of event generation with millisecond precision.

property.name: retrievalTime
property.description: Indicates if the event has already been retrieved (by webMethods). Value is null if it hasn't yet, an actual date otherwise.

property.name: meta
property.description: Additional meta information for the event.
